description:
Lightweight, super sensitive and ridiculously aggressive for your next project. Purpose-built for sending steep technical boulders and overhanging lines, the Drago does without a traditional midsole for a truly locked-in fit.

  • Non-stretchy microsuede for a consistent fit over time
  • Long narrow PCB (Power Connection Band) strap runs from the toe to heel and provides a "sucked in" fit at the arch
  • Rubber-wrapped forefoot is ideal for technical toe hooks and scumming
  • Aggressive downturned design is ideal for steep routes
  • Dual pull-loops at the heel
  • Vibram® XS Grip 2 rubber provides exceptional friction and outstanding sensitivity
  • Members typically downsize 1-1.5 sizes (performance fit) or 0.5-1 sizes (comfort fit) from their street shoe size
name: Scarpa Drago Rock Shoes - Unisex
